alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:31PM EDT until June 13 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lanier County in south central Georgia... Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 530 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hahira to 11 miles southeast of Quitman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Lakeland, Hahira, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Naylor, Greenwood, Barretts, Twin Lakes, Hansell, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
